mapper.select: select member_product_no, member_no, member_name,product_no,product_name,p.product_category, mp.product_quantity, status from member_product mp inner join member m using (member_no) inner join product p using (product_no) where mp.status = '대기'
mapper.update: update member_product set status = '허가' where member_product_no = #{orderNo}
